short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is only for Meetask app!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
MeeTask Recorder: Capture, Transcribe, and Manage Your Meetings Effortlessly

Transform your meetings into actionable tasks with the MeeTask Recorder Chrome extension. This powerful tool allows you to seamlessly record both meeting audio and your microphone input with superior quality. Whether you need to capture every word in a conference or just your own thoughts, MeeTask Recorder ensures you won't miss a thing.

Key Features:
 - High-Quality Audio Recording: Record meeting audio and microphone input with exceptional clarity.
 - Mute/Unmute Controls: Independently mute or unmute the meeting audio or your microphone to manage what gets recorded.
 - Pause and Resume Recording: Easily pause the recording when needed and resume at your convenience.
 - Effortless Integration: Open the recorder tab in MeeTask to start capturing your meetings.
 - Save and Manage Recordings: Save your recorded meetings directly in the MeeTask app for easy access and management.
 - Automatic Transcription: Convert your meeting audio into text automatically, making it simple to review and share meeting minutes.
 - Actionable Insights: Utilize AI-based solutions to digitalize meeting minutes and integrate task management, helping you turn discussions into actionable tasks.
 
MeeTask is designed to streamline your meeting experience, ensuring that no valuable information is lost and that you can focus on what truly matters â€“ transforming words into tasks.
